comment.author: 10957255@N08
comment._content: People are created in the image of God. Not animals. God bless.

comment.author: 57139324@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/chrisyarzab]Dear Bible basher - The word "animal" comes from the Latin word animalis, meaning "having breath"! Also "men are born ignorant- not stupid. They are made stupid by education."
-Bertrand Russell
